body:
# Open Source Festival
## Wednesday, October 24, 2012 Noon-5pm in the DCC


The goal is to introduce more people to the world of Open Source Software and spread knowledge to everyone about this phenomenon. 

### Speakers
We plan to have a series of speakers throughout the day who are willing to give a 20-minute presentation on any topic within the scope of Open Source Software. We are currently looking for volunteer presenters. 

### Poster Session 
If you would like to participate in either, please fill out [this form](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheet/viewform?fromEmail=true&formkey=dDRGNkNCUjJ5ZG1WbWZGR2NrN1BXVVE6MQ). We will get back to you in a few weeks with a specific presentation time and details on the location.
